8:1.t: They ask you, [O Muḥammad], about the bounties [of war]. Say, "The [decision concerning] bounties is for Allāh and the Messenger." So fear Allāh and amend that which is between you and obey Allāh and His Messenger, if you should be believers.

segments.t: They ask you, [O Muḥammad],
about the bounties [of war].
Say, "The [decision concerning] bounties
is for Allāh and the Messenger."
So fear Allāh and amend that which is between you
and obey Allāh and His Messenger,
if you should be believers.

8:10.t: And Allāh made it not but good tidings and so that your hearts would be assured thereby. And victory is not but from Allāh. Indeed, Allāh is Exalted in Might and Wise.

segments.t: And Allāh made it not but good tidings
and so that your hearts would be assured thereby.
And victory is not but from Allāh.
Indeed, Allāh is Exalted in Might and Wise.

8:11.t: [Remember] when He overwhelmed you with drowsiness [giving] security from Him and sent down upon you from the sky, rain by which to purify you and remove from you the evil [suggestions] of Satan and to make steadfast your hearts and plant firmly thereby your feet.

segments.t: [Remember] when He overwhelmed you with drowsiness [giving] security from Him
and sent down upon you from the sky, rain by which to purify you
and remove from you the evil [suggestions] of Satan
and to make steadfast your hearts and plant firmly thereby your feet.

8:12.t: [Remember] when your Lord inspired to the angels, "I am with you, so strengthen those who have believed. I will cast terror into the hearts of those who disbelieved, so strike [them] upon the necks and strike from them every fingertip."

segments.t: [Remember] when your Lord inspired to the angels,
"I am with you,
so strengthen those who have believed.
I will cast terror into the hearts of those who disbelieved,
so strike [them] upon the necks
and strike from them every fingertip."

8:13.t: That is because they opposed Allāh and His Messenger. And whoever opposes Allāh and His Messenger - indeed, Allāh is severe in penalty.

segments.t: That is because they opposed Allāh and His Messenger.
And whoever opposes Allāh and His Messenger -
indeed, Allāh is severe in penalty.

8:14.t: "That [is yours], so taste it." And indeed for the disbelievers is the punishment of the Fire.

segments.t: "That [is yours],
so taste it."
And indeed for the disbelievers
is the punishment of the Fire.

8:15.t: O you who have believed, when you meet those who disbelieve advancing [in battle], do not turn to them your backs [in flight].

segments.t: O you who have believed,
when you meet those who disbelieve advancing [in battle],
do not turn to them your backs [in flight].

8:16.t: And whoever turns his back to them on such a day, unless swerving [as a strategy] for war or joining [another] company, has certainly returned with anger [upon him] from Allāh, and his refuge is Hell - and wretched is the destination.

segments.t: And whoever turns his back to them on such a day,
unless swerving [as a strategy] for war
or joining [another] company,
has certainly returned with anger [upon him] from Allāh,
and his refuge is Hell -
and wretched is the destination.

8:17.t: And you did not kill them, but it was Allāh who killed them. And you threw not, [O Muḥammad], when you threw, but it was Allāh who threw that He might test the believers with a good test. Indeed, Allāh is Hearing and Knowing.

segments.t: And you did not kill them,
but it was Allāh who killed them.
And you threw not, [O Muḥammad], when you threw,
but it was Allāh who threw that He might test the believers
with a good test.
Indeed, Allāh is Hearing and Knowing.

8:18.t: That [is so], and [also] that Allāh will weaken the plot of the disbelievers.

segments.t: That [is so],
and [also] that Allāh will weaken
the plot of the disbelievers.

8:19.t: If you [disbelievers] seek the decision [i.e., victory] - the decision [i.e., defeat] has come to you. And if you desist [from hostilities], it is best for you; but if you return [to war], We will return, and never will you be availed by your [large] company at all, even if it should increase; and [that is] because Allāh is with the believers.

segments.t: If you [disbelievers] seek the decision [i.e., victory] -
the decision [i.e., defeat] has come to you.
And if you desist [from hostilities],
it is best for you;
but if you return [to war],
We will return,
and never will you be availed by your [large] company at all,
even if it should increase;
and [that is] because Allāh is with the believers.

8:2.t: The believers are only those who, when Allāh is mentioned, their hearts become fearful, and when His verses are recited to them, it increases them in faith; and upon their Lord they rely -

segments.t: The believers are only those who,
when Allāh is mentioned,
their hearts become fearful,
and when His verses are recited to them,
it increases them in faith;
and upon their Lord they rely -

8:20.t: O you who have believed, obey Allāh and His Messenger and do not turn from him while you hear [his order].

segments.t: O you who have believed,
obey Allāh and His Messenger
and do not turn from him
while you hear [his order].

8:21.t: And do not be like those who say, "We have heard," while they do not hear.

segments.t: And do not be like those who say,
"We have heard,"
while they do not hear.

8:22.t: Indeed, the worst of living creatures in the sight of Allāh are the deaf and dumb who do not use reason [i.e., the disbelievers].

segments.t: Indeed, the worst of living creatures in the sight of Allāh
are the deaf and dumb
who do not use reason [i.e., the disbelievers].

8:23.t: Had Allāh known any good in them, He would have made them hear. And if He had made them hear, they would [still] have turned away, while they were refusing.

segments.t: Had Allāh known any good in them,
He would have made them hear.
And if He had made them hear,
they would [still] have turned away,
while they were refusing.

8:24.t: O you who have believed, respond to Allāh and to the Messenger when he calls you to that which gives you life. And know that Allāh intervenes between a man and his heart and that to Him you will be gathered.

segments.t: O you who have believed,
respond to Allāh and to the Messenger
when he calls you to that which gives you life.
And know that Allāh intervenes between a man and his heart
and that to Him you will be gathered.

8:25.t: And fear a trial which will not strike those who have wronged among you exclusively, and know that Allāh is severe in penalty.

segments.t: And fear a trial which will not strike
those who have wronged among you exclusively,
and know that Allāh is severe in penalty.

8:26.t: And remember when you were few and oppressed in the land, fearing that people might abduct you, but He sheltered you, supported you with His victory, and provided you with good things - that you might be grateful.

segments.t: And remember when you were few and oppressed in the land,
fearing that people might abduct you,
but He sheltered you,
supported you with His victory,
and provided you with good things -
that you might be grateful.

8:27.t: O you who have believed, do not betray Allāh and the Messenger or betray your trusts while you know [the consequence].

segments.t: O you who have believed,
do not betray Allāh and the Messenger
or betray your trusts
while you know [the consequence].

8:28.t: And know that your properties and your children are but a trial and that Allāh has with Him a great reward.

segments.t: And know that your properties and your children are but a trial
and that Allāh has with Him a great reward.

8:29.t: O you who have believed, if you fear Allāh, He will grant you a criterion and will remove from you your misdeeds and forgive you. And Allāh is the possessor of great bounty.

segments.t: O you who have believed,
if you fear Allāh,
He will grant you a criterion
and will remove from you your misdeeds
and forgive you.
And Allāh is the possessor of great bounty.

8:3.t: The ones who establish prayer, and from what We have provided them, they spend.

segments.t: The ones who establish prayer,
and from what We have provided them,
they spend.

8:30.t: And [remember, O Muḥammad], when those who disbelieved plotted against you to restrain you or kill you or evict you [from Makkah]. But they plan, and Allāh plans. And Allāh is the best of planners.

segments.t: And [remember, O Muḥammad],
when those who disbelieved plotted against you
to restrain you or kill you or evict you [from Makkah].
But they plan, and Allāh plans.
And Allāh is the best of planners.

8:31.t: And when Our verses are recited to them, they say, "We have heard. If we willed, we could say [something] like this. This is not but legends of the former peoples."

segments.t: And when Our verses are recited to them,
they say, "We have heard.
If we willed, we could say [something] like this.
This is not but legends of the former peoples."

8:32.t: And [remember] when they said, "O Allāh, if this should be the truth from You, then rain down upon us stones from the sky or bring us a painful punishment."

segments.t: And [remember] when they said,
"O Allāh,
if this should be the truth from You,
then rain down upon us stones from the sky
or bring us a painful punishment."

8:33.t: But Allāh would not punish them while you, [O Muḥammad], are among them, and Allāh would not punish them while they seek forgiveness.

segments.t: But Allāh would not punish them
while you, [O Muḥammad], are among them,
and Allāh would not punish them
while they seek forgiveness.

8:34.t: But why should Allāh not punish them while they obstruct [people] from al-Masjid al-Ḥarām and they were not [fit to be] its guardians? Its [true] guardians are not but the righteous, but most of them do not know.

segments.t: But why should Allāh not punish them
while they obstruct [people] from al-Masjid al-Ḥarām
and they were not [fit to be] its guardians?
Its [true] guardians are not but the righteous,
but most of them do not know.

8:35.t: And their prayer at the House [i.e., the Kaʿbah] was not except whistling and handclapping. So taste the punishment for what you disbelieved [i.e., practiced of deviations].

segments.t: And their prayer at the House [i.e., the Kaʿbah]
was not except whistling and handclapping.
So taste the punishment for what you disbelieved [i.e., practiced of deviations].

8:36.t: Indeed, those who disbelieve spend their wealth to avert [people] from the way of Allāh. So they will spend it; then it will be for them a [source of] regret; then they will be overcome. And those who have disbelieved - unto Hell they will be gathered.

segments.t: Indeed, those who disbelieve spend their wealth
to avert [people] from the way of Allāh.
So they will spend it;
then it will be for them a [source of] regret;
then they will be overcome.
And those who have disbelieved -
unto Hell they will be gathered.

8:37.t: [It is] so that Allāh may distinguish the wicked from the good and place the wicked some of them upon others and heap them all together and put them into Hell. It is those who are the losers.

segments.t: [It is] so that Allāh may distinguish the wicked from the good
and place the wicked some of them upon others
and heap them all together
and put them into Hell.
It is those who are the losers.

8:38.t: Say to those who have disbelieved [that] if they cease, what has previously occurred will be forgiven for them. But if they return [to hostility] - then the precedent of the former [rebellious] peoples has already taken place.

segments.t: Say to those who have disbelieved [that] if they cease,
what has previously occurred will be forgiven for them.
But if they return [to hostility] -
then the precedent of the former [rebellious] peoples has already taken place.

8:39.t: And fight against them until there is no fitnah and [until] the religion [i.e., worship], all of it, is for Allāh. And if they cease - then indeed, Allāh is Seeing of what they do.

segments.t: And fight against them
until there is no fitnah
and [until] the religion [i.e., worship],
all of it, is for Allāh.
And if they cease -
then indeed, Allāh is Seeing of what they do.

8:4.t: Those are the believers, truly. For them are degrees [of high position] with their Lord and forgiveness and noble provision.

segments.t: Those are the believers, truly.
For them are degrees [of high position] with their Lord
and forgiveness and noble provision.

8:40.t: But if they turn away - then know that Allāh is your protector. Excellent is the protector, and excellent is the helper.

segments.t: But if they turn away -
then know that Allāh is your protector.
Excellent is the protector,
and excellent is the helper.

8:41.t: And know that anything you obtain of war booty - then indeed, for Allāh is one fifth of it and for the Messenger and for [his] near relatives and the orphans, the needy, and the [stranded] traveler, if you have believed in Allāh and in that which We sent down to Our Servant on the day of criterion [i.e., decisive encounter] - the day when the two armies met [at Badr]. And Allāh, over all things, is competent.

segments.t: And know that anything you obtain of war booty -
then indeed, for Allāh is one fifth of it
and for the Messenger and for [his] near relatives
and the orphans, the needy, and the [stranded] traveler,
if you have believed in Allāh
and in that which We sent down to Our Servant
on the day of criterion [i.e., decisive encounter] -
the day when the two armies met [at Badr].
And Allāh, over all things, is competent.

8:42.t: [Remember] when you were on the near side of the valley, and they were on the farther side, and the caravan was lower [in position] than you. If you had made an appointment [to meet], you would have missed the appointment. But [it was] so that Allāh might accomplish a matter already destined - that those who perished [through disbelief] would perish upon evidence and those who lived [in faith] would live upon evidence; and indeed, Allāh is Hearing and Knowing.

segments.t: [Remember] when you were on the near side of the valley,
and they were on the farther side,
and the caravan was lower [in position] than you.
If you had made an appointment [to meet],
you would have missed the appointment.
But [it was] so that Allāh might accomplish a matter already destined -
that those who perished [through disbelief] would perish upon evidence
and those who lived [in faith] would live upon evidence;
and indeed, Allāh is Hearing and Knowing.

8:43.t: [Remember, O Muḥammad], when Allāh showed them to you in your dream as few; and if He had shown them to you as many, you [believers] would have lost courage and would have disputed in the matter [of whether to fight], but Allāh saved [you from that]. Indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.

segments.t: [Remember, O Muḥammad], when Allāh showed them to you in your dream as few;
and if He had shown them to you as many,
you [believers] would have lost courage and would have disputed in the matter [of whether to fight],
but Allāh saved [you from that].
Indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.

8:44.t: And [remember] when He showed them to you, when you met, as few in your eyes, and He made you [appear] as few in their eyes so that Allāh might accomplish a matter already destined. And to Allāh are [all] matters returned.

segments.t: And [remember] when He showed them to you,
when you met, as few in your eyes,
and He made you [appear] as few in their eyes
so that Allāh might accomplish a matter already destined.
And to Allāh are [all] matters returned.

8:45.t: O you who have believed, when you encounter a company [from the enemy forces], stand firm and remember Allāh much that you may be successful.

segments.t: O you who have believed,
when you encounter a company [from the enemy forces],
stand firm and remember Allāh much
that you may be successful.

8:46.t: And obey Allāh and His Messenger, and do not dispute and [thus] lose courage and [then] your strength would depart; and be patient. Indeed, Allāh is with the patient.

segments.t: And obey Allāh and His Messenger,
and do not dispute and [thus] lose courage
and [then] your strength would depart;
and be patient.
Indeed, Allāh is with the patient.

8:47.t: And do not be like those who came forth from their homes insolently and to be seen by people and avert [them] from the way of Allāh. And Allāh is encompassing of what they do.

segments.t: And do not be like those who came forth from their homes insolently
and to be seen by people
and avert [them] from the way of Allāh.
And Allāh is encompassing of what they do.

8:48.t: And [remember] when Satan made their deeds pleasing to them and said, "No one can overcome you today from among the people, and indeed, I am your protector." But when the two armies sighted each other, he turned on his heels and said, "Indeed, I am disassociated from you. Indeed, I see what you do not see; indeed, I fear Allāh. And Allāh is severe in penalty."

segments.t: And [remember] when Satan made their deeds pleasing to them and said,
"No one can overcome you today from among the people,
and indeed, I am your protector."
But when the two armies sighted each other,
he turned on his heels and said,
"Indeed, I am disassociated from you.
Indeed, I see what you do not see;
indeed, I fear Allāh.
And Allāh is severe in penalty."

8:49.t: [Remember] when the hypocrites and those in whose hearts was disease [i.e., arrogance and disbelief] said, "Their religion has deluded those [Muslims]." But whoever relies upon Allāh - then indeed, Allāh is Exalted in Might and Wise.

segments.t: [Remember] when the hypocrites
and those in whose hearts was disease [i.e., arrogance and disbelief] said,
"Their religion has deluded those [Muslims]."
But whoever relies upon Allāh -
then indeed, Allāh is Exalted in Might and Wise.

8:5.t: [It is] just as when your Lord brought you out of your home [for the battle of Badr] in truth, while indeed, a party among the believers were unwilling,

segments.t: [It is] just as when your Lord brought you out of your home
[for the battle of Badr] in truth,
while indeed, a party among the believers were unwilling,

8:50.t: And if you could but see when the angels take the souls of those who disbelieved... They are striking their faces and their backs and [saying], "Taste the punishment of the Burning Fire.

segments.t: And if you could but see
when the angels take the souls of those who disbelieved...
They are striking their faces and their backs and [saying],
"Taste the punishment of the Burning Fire.

8:51.t: That is for what your hands have put forth [of evil] and because Allāh is not ever unjust to [His] servants."

segments.t: That is for what your hands have put forth [of evil]
and because Allāh is not ever unjust to [His] servants."

8:52.t: [Theirs is] like the custom of the people of Pharaoh and of those before them. They disbelieved in the signs of Allāh, so Allāh seized them for their sins. Indeed, Allāh is Powerful and severe in penalty.

segments.t: [Theirs is] like the custom of the people of Pharaoh
and of those before them.
They disbelieved in the signs of Allāh,
so Allāh seized them for their sins.
Indeed, Allāh is Powerful and severe in penalty.

8:53.t: That is because Allāh would not change a favor which He had bestowed upon a people until they change what is within themselves. And indeed, Allāh is Hearing and Knowing.

segments.t: That is because Allāh would not change a favor
which He had bestowed upon a people
until they change what is within themselves.
And indeed, Allāh is Hearing and Knowing.

8:54.t: [Theirs is] like the custom of the people of Pharaoh and of those before them. They denied the signs of their Lord, so We destroyed them for their sins, and We drowned the people of Pharaoh. And all [of them] were wrongdoers.

segments.t: [Theirs is] like the custom of the people of Pharaoh
and of those before them.
They denied the signs of their Lord,
so We destroyed them for their sins,
and We drowned the people of Pharaoh.
And all [of them] were wrongdoers.

8:55.t: Indeed, the worst of living creatures in the sight of Allāh are those who have disbelieved, and they will not [ever] believe-

segments.t: Indeed, the worst of living creatures
in the sight of Allāh
are those who have disbelieved,
and they will not [ever] believe-

8:56.t: The ones with whom you made a treaty but then they break their pledge every time, and they do not fear Allāh.

segments.t: The ones with whom you made a treaty
but then they break their pledge every time,
and they do not fear Allāh.

8:57.t: So if you, [O Muḥammad], gain dominance over them in war, disperse by [means of] them those behind them that perhaps they will be reminded.

segments.t: So if you, [O Muḥammad],
gain dominance over them in war,
disperse by [means of] them those behind them
that perhaps they will be reminded.

8:58.t: If you [have reason to] fear from a people betrayal, throw [their treaty] back to them, [putting you] on equal terms. Indeed, Allāh does not like traitors.

segments.t: If you [have reason to] fear from a people betrayal,
throw [their treaty] back to them, [putting you] on equal terms.
Indeed, Allāh does not like traitors.

8:59.t: And let not those who disbelieve think they will escape. Indeed, they will not cause failure [to Allāh].

segments.t: And let not those who disbelieve think they will escape.
Indeed, they will not cause failure [to Allāh].

8:6.t: Arguing with you concerning the truth after it had become clear, as if they were being driven toward death while they were looking on.

segments.t: Arguing with you concerning the truth
after it had become clear,
as if they were being driven toward death
while they were looking on.

8:60.t: And prepare against them whatever you are able of power and of steeds of war by which you may terrify the enemy of Allāh and your enemy and others besides them whom you do not know [but] whom Allāh knows. And whatever you spend in the cause of Allāh will be fully repaid to you, and you will not be wronged.

segments.t: And prepare against them whatever you are able of power
and of steeds of war
by which you may terrify the enemy of Allāh and your enemy
and others besides them whom you do not know [but] whom Allāh knows.
And whatever you spend in the cause of Allāh will be fully repaid to you,
and you will not be wronged.

8:61.t: And if they incline to peace, then incline to it [also] and rely upon Allāh. Indeed, it is He who is the Hearing, the Knowing.

segments.t: And if they incline to peace,
then incline to it [also]
and rely upon Allāh.
Indeed, it is He who is the Hearing, the Knowing.

8:62.t: But if they intend to deceive you - then sufficient for you is Allāh. It is He who supported you with His help and with the believers

segments.t: But if they intend to deceive you -
then sufficient for you is Allāh.
It is He who supported you with His help
and with the believers

8:63.t: And brought together their hearts. If you had spent all that is in the earth, you could not have brought their hearts together; but Allāh brought them together. Indeed, He is Exalted in Might and Wise.

segments.t: And brought together their hearts.
If you had spent all that is in the earth,
you could not have brought their hearts together;
but Allāh brought them together.
Indeed, He is Exalted in Might and Wise.

8:64.t: O Prophet, sufficient for you is Allāh and for whoever follows you of the believers.

segments.t: O Prophet,
sufficient for you is Allāh
and for whoever follows you of the believers.

8:65.t: O Prophet, urge the believers to battle. If there are among you twenty [who are] steadfast, they will overcome two hundred. And if there are among you one hundred [who are steadfast], they will overcome a thousand of those who have disbelieved because they are a people who do not understand.

segments.t: O Prophet,
urge the believers to battle.
If there are among you twenty [who are] steadfast,
they will overcome two hundred.
And if there are among you one hundred [who are steadfast],
they will overcome a thousand of those who have disbelieved
because they are a people who do not understand.
